title: From sugars to aliphatic amines: as sweet as it sounds? Production and applications of bio-based aliphatic amines
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00244J, Review Article

Benjamin Vermeeren, Sofie Van Praet, Wouter Arts, Thomas Narmon, Yingtuan Zhang, Cheng Zhou, Hans P. Steenackers, Bert F. Sels
This review provides a holistic overview of aliphatic amine production, from feedstock to applications. It assesses the feasibility of using biomass as an alternative resource in amine synthesis and their usage in applications of societal importance.
